topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54447cfc63687246521d0200#post_54447cfc63687246521d0200

The strongest ability in OP so far would be Kizaru, who can become light to certain extent.

In Jojo's, there's a guy who can reset the Universe to the very beginning and fast foward it to whatever point he wants.

Only mangas that can take on Jojo's (by popular admission) are Bastard, Berserk, Saint Seiya and Tenchi Muyo
